title: Jove Publication
text: Emily Mihalko, Abiha Abdullah, Lara Hoteit, David Akinbode, Susan Shea, and Matthew Neal recently had their work in generating a platelet-rich thrombi under arterial flow conditions using a microfluidic device published in Jove.
